features: LAUNDRY DRY WASH SPRAY: Ever wish for a quick and easy solution to refresh, lightly worn clothes that aren’t ready for a full wash? Faultless ReWear Dry Wash Spray revives worn clothes instantly with just a few sprays.. Prevent your clothes from piling up on your “chaird-robe” by dry washing your clothes instead of doing a full load of laundry.

REWEAR WITHOUT WASHING: With ReWear Dry Wash Fabric Spray, you won’t waste time doing laundry when your clothes don’t need it. Faultless ReWear Dry Wash Spray instantly restores your worn clothes’ clean form by removing wrinkles, eliminating odors and leaving a light, freshly-laundered scent.

FABRIC REFRESHER SPRAY: Protect your clothes from the wear and tear of over washing. This Faultless laundry spray and wrinkle releaser spray instantly restores the look and feel of your clothing with just a few sprays.

QUICK & EASY FABRIC CARE: Looking sharp has never been easier! Just spritz this laundry conditioner spray on clothes, tug gently and they’ll be ready to go in minutes. Or, hang them up instead for another day’s use. Works great on pants/slacks/skirts, dress shirts, t-shirts, business casual pants, jeans, jackets and more.

ECO-FRIENDLY LAUNDRY SUPPLIES: Faultless ReWear clothing spray is a sustainable, environmentally-friendly fabric refreshing product. Save water, minimize your ‘chair-drobe’ use and do less laundry. Faultless ReWear Dry Wash Spray is becoming a household favorite, just like dry shampoo…but for clothes.
body.description: Faultless ReWear Dry Wash SprayRevive worn clothes without doing laundry! There’s a big difference between worn clothes and dirty clothes. Sometimes, all it takes is a little boost to bring them back to life. Faultless ReWear Dry Wash Spray quickly revives your favorite shirts, pants, jeans, jackets and more by removing wrinkles and eliminating odors without laundry hassles. Use after wearing or before your next wear. You’ll feel clean, refreshed and ready to do more of what you really enjoy. Quickly Refreshes Look & SmellCaptures & Eliminates OdorsRemoves & Resists Wrinkles Keeps Whites Whiter & Stains from Setting How to Use: No wrinkles. No odors. No joke. Just apply ReWear Dry Wash Spray to your clothes, tug gently and you’ll be ready to walk out the door in no time. Or, lighten your laundry load by spraying and hanging up clothes, so you’re prepped for another day. Ingredients: + Water+ Hydroxyethyl Urea+ Polyitaconic Acid Sodium Zinc Salt+ Sodium Polyacrylate+ Polysorbate 20+ Dimethicone+ Methylisothiazolinone+ Methychloroisothiazolinone+ FragranceContains fragrance allergens. . About Faultless Brands Faultless Brands was founded in Kansas City, MO in 1887. The company, owned by Architect Equity, a private equity firm based in El Segundo, CA, has a strong commitment to our customers, employees, and planet. To that end, each product is designed and developed with sustainable thinking to not only improve the quality of life of our customers but also, to educate the community and others in our industry of sustainable practices that reduce carbon emissions and the use of natural resources. The Faultless campus uses a variety of roof solar panel technology, rain-collection systems, recycled/re-purposed lumber, Riverfront Heritage Trail System access, energy conservation programs, and packaging reduction programs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells clean and fresh like new laundry
reviews.reviewText: I had a big bottle of this I have used for a year. I sell vintage and this is amazing to refresh old stale items. I also use it on my curtains couches and mattresses things I can’t wash regularly it really works and doesn’t leave a weird residue thank goodness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: These were a lifesaver when I was in Europe! We didn't have a washing machine so using these sprays really saved us. The scent doesn't last a long time but it's enough to just cover up day old clothes.
